078/**
079 * Class that test tags
080 */
081@Category({ RegionServerTests.class, MediumTests.class })
082public class TestTags {
083
084  @ClassRule
085  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE = HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestTags.class);
086
087  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TestTags.class);
088
089  static boolean useFilter = false;
090
091  private final static HBaseTestingUtility TEST_UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtility();
092
093  @Rule
094  public final TestName TEST_NAME = new TestName();
095
096  @BeforeClass
097  public static void setUpBeforeClass() throws Exception {
098    Configuration conf = TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration();
099    conf.setInt("hfile.format.version", 3);
100    conf.setStrings(CoprocessorHost.USER_REGION_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY,
101      TestCoprocessorForTags.class.getName());
102    TEST_UTIL.startMiniCluster(2);
103  }
104
105  @AfterClass
106  public static void tearDownAfterClass() throws Exception {
107    TEST_UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
108  }
109
110  @After
111  public void tearDown() {
112    useFilter = false;
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Test that we can do reverse scans when writing tags and using DataBlockEncoding. Fails with an
117   * exception for PREFIX, DIFF, and FAST_DIFF prior to HBASE-27580
118   */
119  @Test
120  public void testReverseScanWithDBE() throws IOException {
121    byte[] family = Bytes.toBytes("0");
122
123    Configuration conf = new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
124    conf.setInt(HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_RETRIES_NUMBER, 1);
125
126    try (Connection connection = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(conf)) {
127      for (DataBlockEncoding encoding : DataBlockEncoding.values()) {
128        testReverseScanWithDBE(connection, encoding, family, HConstants.DEFAULT_BLOCKSIZE, 10);
129      }
130    }
131  }
132
133  /**
134   * Test that we can do reverse scans when writing tags and using DataBlockEncoding. Fails with an
135   * exception for PREFIX, DIFF, and FAST_DIFF
136   */
137  @Test
138  public void testReverseScanWithDBEWhenCurrentBlockUpdates() throws IOException {
139    byte[] family = Bytes.toBytes("0");
140
141    Configuration conf = new Configuration(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
142    conf.setInt(HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_RETRIES_NUMBER, 1);
143
144    try (Connection connection = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(conf)) {
145      for (DataBlockEncoding encoding : DataBlockEncoding.values()) {
146        testReverseScanWithDBE(connection, encoding, family, 1024, 30000);
147      }
148    }
149  }
150
151  private void testReverseScanWithDBE(Connection conn, DataBlockEncoding encoding, byte[] family,
152    int blockSize, int maxRows) throws IOException {
153    LOG.info("Running test with DBE={}", encoding);
154    TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(TEST_NAME.getMethodName() + "-" + encoding);
155    TEST_UTIL.createTable(
156      TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(tableName).setColumnFamily(ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder
157        .newBuilder(family).setDataBlockEncoding(encoding).setBlocksize(blockSize).build()).build(),
158      null);
159
160    Table table = conn.getTable(tableName);
161
162    byte[] val1 = new byte[10];
163    byte[] val2 = new byte[10];
164    Bytes.random(val1);
165    Bytes.random(val2);
166
167    for (int i = 0; i < maxRows; i++) {
168      table.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes(i)).addColumn(family, Bytes.toBytes(1), val1)
169        .addColumn(family, Bytes.toBytes(2), val2).setTTL(600_000));
170    }
171
172    TEST_UTIL.flush(table.getName());
173
174    Scan scan = new Scan();
175    scan.setReversed(true);
176
177    try (ResultScanner scanner = table.getScanner(scan)) {
178      for (int i = maxRows - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
179        Result row = scanner.next();
180        assertEquals(2, row.size());
181
182        Cell cell1 = row.getColumnLatestCell(family, Bytes.toBytes(1));
183        assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingRows(cell1, Bytes.toBytes(i)));
184        assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingValue(cell1, val1));
185
186        Cell cell2 = row.getColumnLatestCell(family, Bytes.toBytes(2));
187        assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingRows(cell2, Bytes.toBytes(i)));
188        assertTrue(CellUtil.matchingValue(cell2, val2));
189      }
190    }
191
192  }
193
194  @Test
195  public void testTags() throws Exception {
196    Table table = null;
197    try {
198      TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(TEST_NAME.getMethodName());
199      byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
200      byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("rowa");
201      // column names
202      byte[] qual = Bytes.toBytes("qual");
203
204      byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("rowb");
205
206      byte[] row2 = Bytes.toBytes("rowc");
207
208      HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
209      HColumnDescriptor colDesc = new HColumnDescriptor(fam);
210      colDesc.setBlockCacheEnabled(true);
211      colDesc.setDataBlockEncoding(DataBlockEncoding.NONE);
212      desc.addFamily(colDesc);
213      Admin admin = TEST_UTIL.getAdmin();
214      admin.createTable(desc);
215      byte[] value = Bytes.toBytes("value");
216      table = TEST_UTIL.getConnection().getTable(tableName);
217      Put put = new Put(row);
218      put.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value);
219      put.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("myTag"));
220      table.put(put);
221      admin.flush(tableName);
222      // We are lacking an API for confirming flush request compaction.
223      // Just sleep for a short time. We won't be able to confirm flush
224      // completion but the test won't hang now or in the future if
225      // default compaction policy causes compaction between flush and
226      // when we go to confirm it.
227      Thread.sleep(1000);
228
229      Put put1 = new Put(row1);
230      byte[] value1 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
231      put1.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value1);
232      // put1.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("myTag3"));
233      table.put(put1);
234      admin.flush(tableName);
235      Thread.sleep(1000);
236
237      Put put2 = new Put(row2);
238      byte[] value2 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
239      put2.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value2);
240      put2.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("myTag3"));
241      table.put(put2);
242      admin.flush(tableName);
243      Thread.sleep(1000);
244
245      result(fam, row, qual, row2, table, value, value2, row1, value1);
246
247      admin.compact(tableName);
248      while (admin.getCompactionState(tableName) != CompactionState.NONE) {
249        Thread.sleep(10);
250      }
251      result(fam, row, qual, row2, table, value, value2, row1, value1);
252    } finally {
253      if (table != null) {
254        table.close();
255      }
256    }
257  }
258
259  @Test
260  public void testFlushAndCompactionWithoutTags() throws Exception {
261    Table table = null;
262    try {
263      TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(TEST_NAME.getMethodName());
264      byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
265      byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("rowa");
266      // column names
267      byte[] qual = Bytes.toBytes("qual");
268
269      byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("rowb");
270
271      byte[] row2 = Bytes.toBytes("rowc");
272
273      HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
274      HColumnDescriptor colDesc = new HColumnDescriptor(fam);
275      colDesc.setBlockCacheEnabled(true);
276      // colDesc.setDataBlockEncoding(DataBlockEncoding.NONE);
277      // colDesc.setDataBlockEncoding(DataBlockEncoding.PREFIX_TREE);
278      desc.addFamily(colDesc);
279      Admin admin = TEST_UTIL.getAdmin();
280      admin.createTable(desc);
281
282      table = TEST_UTIL.getConnection().getTable(tableName);
283      Put put = new Put(row);
284      byte[] value = Bytes.toBytes("value");
285      put.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value);
286      table.put(put);
287      admin.flush(tableName);
288      // We are lacking an API for confirming flush request compaction.
289      // Just sleep for a short time. We won't be able to confirm flush
290      // completion but the test won't hang now or in the future if
291      // default compaction policy causes compaction between flush and
292      // when we go to confirm it.
293      Thread.sleep(1000);
294
295      Put put1 = new Put(row1);
296      byte[] value1 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
297      put1.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value1);
298      table.put(put1);
299      admin.flush(tableName);
300      Thread.sleep(1000);
301
302      Put put2 = new Put(row2);
303      byte[] value2 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
304      put2.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value2);
305      table.put(put2);
306      admin.flush(tableName);
307      Thread.sleep(1000);
308
309      Scan s = new Scan(row);
310      ResultScanner scanner = table.getScanner(s);
311      try {
312        Result[] next = scanner.next(3);
313        for (Result result : next) {
314          CellScanner cellScanner = result.cellScanner();
315          cellScanner.advance();
316          Cell current = cellScanner.current();
317          assertEquals(0, current.getTagsLength());
318        }
319      } finally {
320        if (scanner != null) scanner.close();
321      }
322      admin.compact(tableName);
323      while (admin.getCompactionState(tableName) != CompactionState.NONE) {
324        Thread.sleep(10);
325      }
326      s = new Scan(row);
327      scanner = table.getScanner(s);
328      try {
329        Result[] next = scanner.next(3);
330        for (Result result : next) {
331          CellScanner cellScanner = result.cellScanner();
332          cellScanner.advance();
333          Cell current = cellScanner.current();
334          assertEquals(0, current.getTagsLength());
335        }
336      } finally {
337        if (scanner != null) {
338          scanner.close();
339        }
340      }
341    } finally {
342      if (table != null) {
343        table.close();
344      }
345    }
346  }
347
348  @Test
349  public void testFlushAndCompactionwithCombinations() throws Exception {
350    TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(TEST_NAME.getMethodName());
351    byte[] fam = Bytes.toBytes("info");
352    byte[] row = Bytes.toBytes("rowa");
353    // column names
354    byte[] qual = Bytes.toBytes("qual");
355
356    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("rowb");
357
358    byte[] row2 = Bytes.toBytes("rowc");
359    byte[] rowd = Bytes.toBytes("rowd");
360    byte[] rowe = Bytes.toBytes("rowe");
361    Table table = null;
362    for (DataBlockEncoding encoding : DataBlockEncoding.values()) {
363      HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
364      HColumnDescriptor colDesc = new HColumnDescriptor(fam);
365      colDesc.setBlockCacheEnabled(true);
366      colDesc.setDataBlockEncoding(encoding);
367      desc.addFamily(colDesc);
368      Admin admin = TEST_UTIL.getAdmin();
369      admin.createTable(desc);
370      try {
371        table = TEST_UTIL.getConnection().getTable(tableName);
372        Put put = new Put(row);
373        byte[] value = Bytes.toBytes("value");
374        put.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value);
375        int bigTagLen = Short.MAX_VALUE - 5;
376        put.setAttribute("visibility", new byte[bigTagLen]);
377        table.put(put);
378        Put put1 = new Put(row1);
379        byte[] value1 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
380        put1.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value1);
381        table.put(put1);
382        admin.flush(tableName);
383        // We are lacking an API for confirming flush request compaction.
384        // Just sleep for a short time. We won't be able to confirm flush
385        // completion but the test won't hang now or in the future if
386        // default compaction policy causes compaction between flush and
387        // when we go to confirm it.
388        Thread.sleep(1000);
389
390        put1 = new Put(row2);
391        value1 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
392        put1.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value1);
393        table.put(put1);
394        admin.flush(tableName);
395        Thread.sleep(1000);
396
397        Put put2 = new Put(rowd);
398        byte[] value2 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsdf");
399        put2.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value2);
400        table.put(put2);
401        put2 = new Put(rowe);
402        value2 = Bytes.toBytes("1000dfsddfdf");
403        put2.addColumn(fam, qual, HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, value2);
404        put.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("ram"));
405        table.put(put2);
406        admin.flush(tableName);
407        Thread.sleep(1000);
408
409        TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
410        Scan s = new Scan(row);
411        s.setCaching(1);
412        ResultScanner scanner = table.getScanner(s);
413        try {
414          Result next = null;
415          while ((next = scanner.next()) != null) {
416            CellScanner cellScanner = next.cellScanner();
417            cellScanner.advance();
418            Cell current = cellScanner.current();
419            if (CellUtil.matchingRows(current, row)) {
420              assertEquals(1, TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.size());
421              Tag tag = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.get(0);
422              assertEquals(bigTagLen, tag.getValueLength());
423            } else {
424              assertEquals(0, TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.size());
425            }
426          }
427        } finally {
428          if (scanner != null) {
429            scanner.close();
430          }
431          TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
432        }
433        while (admin.getCompactionState(tableName) != CompactionState.NONE) {
434          Thread.sleep(10);
435        }
436        TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
437        scanner = table.getScanner(s);
438        try {
439          Result next = null;
440          while ((next = scanner.next()) != null) {
441            CellScanner cellScanner = next.cellScanner();
442            cellScanner.advance();
443            Cell current = cellScanner.current();
444            if (CellUtil.matchingRows(current, row)) {
445              assertEquals(1, TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.size());
446              Tag tag = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.get(0);
447              assertEquals(bigTagLen, tag.getValueLength());
448            } else {
449              assertEquals(0, TestCoprocessorForTags.tags.size());
450            }
451          }
452        } finally {
453          if (scanner != null) {
454            scanner.close();
455          }
456          TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
457        }
458      } finally {
459        if (table != null) {
460          table.close();
461        }
462        // delete the table
463        admin.disableTable(tableName);
464        admin.deleteTable(tableName);
465      }
466    }
467  }
468
469  @Test
470  public void testTagsWithAppendAndIncrement() throws Exception {
471    TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(TEST_NAME.getMethodName());
472    byte[] f = Bytes.toBytes("f");
473    byte[] q = Bytes.toBytes("q");
474    byte[] row1 = Bytes.toBytes("r1");
475    byte[] row2 = Bytes.toBytes("r2");
476
477    HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
478    HColumnDescriptor colDesc = new HColumnDescriptor(f);
479    desc.addFamily(colDesc);
480    TEST_UTIL.getAdmin().createTable(desc);
481
482    Table table = null;
483    try {
484      table = TEST_UTIL.getConnection().getTable(tableName);
485      Put put = new Put(row1);
486      byte[] v = Bytes.toBytes(2L);
487      put.addColumn(f, q, v);
488      put.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag1"));
489      table.put(put);
490      Increment increment = new Increment(row1);
491      increment.addColumn(f, q, 1L);
492      table.increment(increment);
493      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
494      ResultScanner scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan());
495      Result result = scanner.next();
496      KeyValue kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
497      List<Tag> tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
498      assertEquals(3L, Bytes.toLong(kv.getValueArray(), kv.getValueOffset(), kv.getValueLength()));
499      assertEquals(1, tags.size());
500      assertEquals("tag1", Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tags.get(0))));
501      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
502      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
503
504      increment = new Increment(row1);
505      increment.add(new KeyValue(row1, f, q, 1234L, v));
506      increment.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag2"));
507      table.increment(increment);
508      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
509      scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan());
510      result = scanner.next();
511      kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
512      tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
513      assertEquals(5L, Bytes.toLong(kv.getValueArray(), kv.getValueOffset(), kv.getValueLength()));
514      assertEquals(2, tags.size());
515      // We cannot assume the ordering of tags
516      List<String> tagValues = new ArrayList<>();
517      for (Tag tag : tags) {
518        tagValues.add(Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tag)));
519      }
520      assertTrue(tagValues.contains("tag1"));
521      assertTrue(tagValues.contains("tag2"));
522      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
523      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
524
525      put = new Put(row2);
526      v = Bytes.toBytes(2L);
527      put.addColumn(f, q, v);
528      table.put(put);
529      increment = new Increment(row2);
530      increment.add(new KeyValue(row2, f, q, 1234L, v));
531      increment.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag2"));
532      table.increment(increment);
533      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
534      scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan().setStartRow(row2));
535      result = scanner.next();
536      kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
537      tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
538      assertEquals(4L, Bytes.toLong(kv.getValueArray(), kv.getValueOffset(), kv.getValueLength()));
539      assertEquals(1, tags.size());
540      assertEquals("tag2", Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tags.get(0))));
541      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
542      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
543
544      // Test Append
545      byte[] row3 = Bytes.toBytes("r3");
546      put = new Put(row3);
547      put.addColumn(f, q, Bytes.toBytes("a"));
548      put.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag1"));
549      table.put(put);
550      Append append = new Append(row3);
551      append.addColumn(f, q, Bytes.toBytes("b"));
552      table.append(append);
553      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
554      scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan().setStartRow(row3));
555      result = scanner.next();
556      kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
557      tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
558      assertEquals(1, tags.size());
559      assertEquals("tag1", Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tags.get(0))));
560      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
561      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
562
563      append = new Append(row3);
564      append.add(new KeyValue(row3, f, q, 1234L, v));
565      append.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag2"));
566      table.append(append);
567      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
568      scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan().setStartRow(row3));
569      result = scanner.next();
570      kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
571      tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
572      assertEquals(2, tags.size());
573      // We cannot assume the ordering of tags
574      tagValues.clear();
575      for (Tag tag : tags) {
576        tagValues.add(Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tag)));
577      }
578      assertTrue(tagValues.contains("tag1"));
579      assertTrue(tagValues.contains("tag2"));
580      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
581      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
582
583      byte[] row4 = Bytes.toBytes("r4");
584      put = new Put(row4);
585      put.addColumn(f, q, Bytes.toBytes("a"));
586      table.put(put);
587      append = new Append(row4);
588      append.add(new KeyValue(row4, f, q, 1234L, v));
589      append.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("tag2"));
590      table.append(append);
591      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = true;
592      scanner = table.getScanner(new Scan().setStartRow(row4));
593      result = scanner.next();
594      kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(result.getColumnLatestCell(f, q));
595      tags = TestCoprocessorForTags.tags;
596      assertEquals(1, tags.size());
597      assertEquals("tag2", Bytes.toString(Tag.cloneValue(tags.get(0))));
598    } finally {
599      TestCoprocessorForTags.checkTagPresence = false;
600      TestCoprocessorForTags.tags = null;
601      if (table != null) {
602        table.close();
603      }
604    }
605  }
606
607  private void result(byte[] fam, byte[] row, byte[] qual, byte[] row2, Table table, byte[] value,
608    byte[] value2, byte[] row1, byte[] value1) throws IOException {
609    Scan s = new Scan(row);
610    // If filters are used this attribute can be specifically check for in
611    // filterKV method and
612    // kvs can be filtered out if the tags of interest is not found in that kv
613    s.setAttribute("visibility", Bytes.toBytes("myTag"));
614    ResultScanner scanner = null;
615    try {
616      scanner = table.getScanner(s);
617      Result next = scanner.next();
618
619      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next.getRow(), row));
620      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next.getValue(fam, qual), value));
621
622      Result next2 = scanner.next();
623      assertTrue(next2 != null);
624      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next2.getRow(), row1));
625      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next2.getValue(fam, qual), value1));
626
627      next2 = scanner.next();
628      assertTrue(next2 != null);
629      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next2.getRow(), row2));
630      assertTrue(Bytes.equals(next2.getValue(fam, qual), value2));
631
632    } finally {
633      if (scanner != null) scanner.close();
634    }
635  }
636
637  public static class TestCoprocessorForTags implements RegionCoprocessor, RegionObserver {
638
639    public static volatile boolean checkTagPresence = false;
640    public static List<Tag> tags = null;
641
642    @Override
643    public Optional<RegionObserver> getRegionObserver() {
644      return Optional.of(this);
645    }
646
647    @Override
648    public void prePut(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e, final Put put,
649      final WALEdit edit, final Durability durability) throws IOException {
650      updateMutationAddingTags(put);
651    }
652
653    private void updateMutationAddingTags(final Mutation m) {
654      byte[] attribute = m.getAttribute("visibility");
655      byte[] cf = null;
656      List<Cell> updatedCells = new ArrayList<>();
657      if (attribute != null) {
658        for (List<? extends Cell> edits : m.getFamilyCellMap().values()) {
659          for (Cell cell : edits) {
660            KeyValue kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(cell);
661            if (cf == null) {
662              cf = CellUtil.cloneFamily(kv);
663            }
664            Tag tag = new ArrayBackedTag((byte) 1, attribute);
665            List<Tag> tagList = new ArrayList<>();
666            tagList.add(tag);
667
668            KeyValue newKV =
669              new KeyValue(CellUtil.cloneRow(kv), 0, kv.getRowLength(), CellUtil.cloneFamily(kv), 0,
670                kv.getFamilyLength(), CellUtil.cloneQualifier(kv), 0, kv.getQualifierLength(),
671                kv.getTimestamp(), KeyValue.Type.codeToType(kv.getTypeByte()),
672                CellUtil.cloneValue(kv), 0, kv.getValueLength(), tagList);
673            ((List<Cell>) updatedCells).add(newKV);
674          }
675        }
676        m.getFamilyCellMap().remove(cf);
677        // Update the family map
678        m.getFamilyCellMap().put(cf, updatedCells);
679      }
680    }
681
682    @Override
683    public Result preIncrement(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e, Increment increment)
684      throws IOException {
685      updateMutationAddingTags(increment);
686      return null;
687    }
688
689    @Override
690    public Result preAppend(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e, Append append)
691      throws IOException {
692      updateMutationAddingTags(append);
693      return null;
694    }
695
696    @Override
697    public boolean postScannerNext(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e,
698      InternalScanner s, List<Result> results, int limit, boolean hasMore) throws IOException {
699      if (checkTagPresence) {
700        if (results.size() > 0) {
701          // Check tag presence in the 1st cell in 1st Result
702          Result result = results.get(0);
703          CellScanner cellScanner = result.cellScanner();
704          if (cellScanner.advance()) {
705            Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
706            tags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(cell);
707          }
708        }
709      }
710      return hasMore;
711    }
712  }
713}
